prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a playful personality and a squishy body shape.
Show me a cute aquatic creature that enjoys playing in the mud and has vibrant colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in wetlands, with distinctive gills and a cheerful demeanor.

Give me a water-type Pokemon that has a simple design but a lovable personality.
